mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `FILE` ( file_id, event_cd, file_nm, file_type, file_path, file_size, uploaded_by, uploaded_date, active_state ) VALUES ( #{fileId}, #{eventCd}, #{fileNm}, #{fileType}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{uploadedBy}, NOW(), '1' )
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_ID AS fileId, EVENT_CD AS eventCd, FILE_NM AS fileNm, FILE_TYPE AS fileType, FILE_PATH AS filePath, FILE_SIZE AS fileSize, UPLOADED_BY AS uploadedBy, UPLOADED_DATE AS uploadedDate, ACTIVE_STATE AS activeState FROM `FILE` WHERE event_cd = #{eventCd} AND ACTIVE_STATE = '1'
